name: 11th International conference on Eco-Sustainable Construction Materials
content: The Organizing Committee invites you to 11th international conference on Eco-Sustainable construction materials (ICESCM-2024) to be held at Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia during the period July 01-02,2024\. It provides a premier interdisciplinary platform for researchers, practitioners, and educators to present and discuss the most recent innovations, trends, and concerns as well as practical challenges encountered and solutions adopted in the fields of Eco-Sustainable Construction Material.
